page.title: 18Religion in Canterbury (2)
page.content: The Canterbury Christian Council works to foster a closer relationship between the{Church}of England, the Roman Catholic Church, the Methodist Church, the Baptist Church, the Huguenots and many other less well-known{Christian} Churches and groups which will work to spread the Christian{Religion}and the word of God in the City, and throughout the whole world. The wide variety of{services} available, the festivals, the church days, the concerts and meetings show that the life of the churches in Canterbury continues to thrive and to move forward in keeping with the new spirit of reconciliation that is abroad in the world.
